verses.verse: Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%H376>man<s%> with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H9112>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H575>"Where<s%> are you <S%H1980>going<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "To <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7341>wide<s%> it is and <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> it is."

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me was <S%H3318>going<s%> out, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> was <S%H3318>coming<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him,

and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7323>"Run,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to that <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3389>'Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H6519>without<s%> <S%H6519>walls,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> it.
'For I,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'will be a <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> her, and I will be the <S%H9202>glory<s%> in her <S%H8432>midst.<s%>' "

<S%H1945>"Ho<s%> <S%H1945>there!<s%> <S%H5127>Flee<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "for I have <S%H6566>dispersed<s%> you as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H1945>"Ho,<s%> <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H4422>Escape,<s%> you who are <S%H3427>living<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>"

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H310>"After<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> He has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>plunder<s%> you, for he who <S%H5060>touches<s%> you, <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of His <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5130>wave<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, so that they will be <S%H7998>plunder<s%> for their <S%H5647>slaves.<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> Me.

<S%H7442>"Sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> for <S%H2009>behold<s%> I am <S%H935>coming<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> and will <S%H1961>become<s%> My <S%H5971>people.<s%> Then I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in your <S%H8432>midst,<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> Me to you.

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as His <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and will <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"Be <S%H2013>silent,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for He is <S%H5782>aroused<s%> from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation.<s%>"
